title: I Knew You Were Trouble
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[02:06.85] Once upon a time, a few mistakes ago
[02:10.02] I was in your sights, you got me alone
[02:12.82] You found me, you found me, you found me, e-e-e-e
[02:17.32] I guess you didn't care and I guess I liked that
[02:22.49] And when I fell hard, you took a step back
[02:25.47] Without me, without me, without me, e-e-e-e
[02:31.45] And he's long gone when he's next to me
[02:36.45] And I realize the blame is on me
[02:44.41] 'Cause I knew you were trouble when you walked in
[02:48.86] So shame on me now
[02:51.10] Flew me to places I'd never been
[02:54.68] 'Til you put me down, oh
[02:57.36] I knew you were trouble when you walked in
[03:01.38] So shame on me now
[03:03.94] Flew me to places I'd never been
[03:06.38] Now I'm lying on the cold hard ground
[03:10.22] Oh, oh, trouble, trouble, trouble
[03:16.06] Oh, oh, trouble, trouble, trouble
[03:19.06] No apologies, he'll never see you cry
[03:24.81] Pretends he doesn't know that he's the reason why
[03:27.66] You're drowning, you're drowning, you're drowning, i-i-i-ing
[03:33.25] Now I heard you moved on from whispers on the street
[03:37.44] A new notch in your belt is all I'll ever be
[03:41.39] And now I see, now I see, now I see, e-e-e-e
[03:47.15] He was long gone when he met me
[03:50.99] And I realize the joke is on me, hey!
[03:56.52] I knew you were trouble when you walked in
[04:03.35] So shame on me now
[04:06.49] Flew me to places I'd never been
[04:09.96] 'Til you put me down, oh
[04:13.23] I knew you were trouble when you walked in
[04:16.53] So shame on me now
[04:19.08] Flew me to places I'd never been
[04:19.45] Now I'm lying on the cold hard ground
[04:20.35] Oh, oh, trouble, trouble, trouble
[04:28.98] Oh, oh, trouble, trouble, trouble
[04:35.23] And the saddest fear
[04:40.82] Comes creeping in
[04:42.12] That you never loved me
[04:43.54] Or her, or anyone, or anything
[04:47.86] Yeah!
[04:49.32] I knew you were trouble when you walked in
[04:53.73] So shame on me now
[04:55.83] Flew me to places I'd never been (never been)
[04:59.32] 'Til you put me down, oh
[05:02.68] I knew you were trouble when you walked in
[05:04.72] (Knew it right there) so shame on me now (knew it right there)
[05:08.74] Flew me to places I'd never been (ooh!)
[05:12.24] Now I'm lying on the cold hard ground
[05:15.59] Oh, oh, trouble, trouble, trouble
[05:17.65] Oh, oh, trouble, trouble, trouble
[05:26.79] I knew you were trouble when you walked in
[05:30.54] Trouble, trouble, trouble
[05:32.89] I knew you were trouble when you walked in
[05:37.38] Trouble, trouble, trouble
[05:39.79]
